short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Melvor 1.2 AutoLooter is a must-have for avid gamers who hate missing out on precious loot. AutoLooter comes to the rescue!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: This is for web version and keep the tab active for this to work.

In every 60 seconds this checks if there is available to loot will perform the Loot action.
